prTitle: feat: implement search and filter functionality for pasta recipes
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented comprehensive search and filter functionality for the pasta recipes React application as specified in issue #72.

### Key Features Implemented:

**Search Functionality:**
- Real-time search by recipe title, ingredients, and description
- Case-insensitive search with instant results
- Clear search button and results counter
- Search results update immediately as user types

**Filter Functionality:**
- Filter by pasta type (spaghetti, penne, lasagna, etc.)
- Filter by Italian region (Northern, Central, Southern)
- Filter by difficulty level (easy, medium, hard)
- Combined filtering (all filters work together)
- Active filter display with individual remove buttons
- Clear all filters button

**Technical Implementation:**
- Created `filterHelpers.js` utility functions for search and filtering logic
- Implemented `RecipeContext` with React hooks and useMemo for performance
- Built responsive `SearchBar` component with real-time search
- Created comprehensive `FilterPanel` with dropdown selectors
- Integrated all components with context for seamless state management
- Added complete recipe data (15 authentic Italian pasta recipes)
- Set up proper routing and navigation
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS

**Components Created:**
- SearchBar: Real-time search input with clear functionality
- FilterPanel: Comprehensive filtering UI with active filter display
- RecipeCard: Beautiful recipe cards with metadata
- RecipeList: Grid layout with search/filter integration
- RecipeContext: Centralized state management with useMemo optimization
- Navigation: Mobile-responsive navigation with routing
- RecipeDetail: Full recipe view page

### Testing Results:

✅ Search functionality works correctly (tested with "carbonara")
✅ Filter by difficulty works (found 7 easy recipes)
✅ Filter by pasta type works (found 4 spaghetti recipes)
✅ Combined filters work (search + region filter)
✅ Filter options populate correctly from data
✅ Build completes successfully with no errors
✅ All components integrate seamlessly

Closes #72
